name: Creamy Steven
description:
Controls:

W,A,S,D to move

Left Click to Shoot

Right Click to use your Cream

Middle Mouse to fire a missile if you obtain it

Description:

Creamy Steven is a 2D Platforming Game following a young adult trapped in a recurrent dreamscape from his youth.

Since Steven's abrupt departure many years ago, the once utopian society known as "the Creamy Kingdom" has grown rife with vermin, cream-killing bees, and all around bad vibes. 

It's up to Steven to fix it and to figure out what these creamy dreams mean...
